name: Poltergeist Traffic Cone
author: Alucard648
info: Straight from Marble Race, a clone ffrom Marble Madness/Hamsterball
description: Moves in 4 directions. If Link is close, it stops and becomes invincible and solid, blocking path. Speed boosts when low HP. Best used in cramped areas.
setup: Requires SolidFFFC.zh and all it`s dependenciesAnimation - 2 rows. 1 for moving and 1 directly below it for blocking. Attribute 1: Proximity DistanceAttribute 2: Berserk HP thresholdAttribute 3: Tile WidthAttribute 4: Tile HeightAttribute 5:Speed modifier for berserk mode
